channel.title: CVE Feed for Secomea -- GateManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Secomea -- GateManager

item.title: CVE-2020-29021|2024-09-17T02:12:03.205Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: A vulnerability in web UI input field of GateManager allows authenticated attacker to enter script tags that could cause XSS. This issue affects: GateManager all versions prior to 9.3.

item.title: CVE-2020-14512|2024-09-17T03:07:15.578Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: GateManager versions prior to 9.2c, The affected product uses a weak hash type, which may allow an attacker to view user passwords.

item.title: CVE-2020-29030|2024-09-17T00:31:38.842Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in web GUI of Secomea GateManager allows an attacker to execute malicious code. This issue affects: Secomea GateManager All versions prior to 9.4.

item.title: CVE-2020-29023|2024-09-17T04:24:59.661Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output from CSV Report Generator of Secomea GateManager allows an authenticated administrator to generate a CSV file that may run arbitrary commands on a victim's computer when opened in a spreadsheet program (like Excel). This issue affects: Secomea GateManager all versions prior to 9.3.

item.title: CVE-2020-29028|2024-09-17T00:10:29.690Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in web GUI of Secomea GateManager allows an attacker to inject arbitrary javascript code. This issue affects: Secomea GateManager all versions prior to 9.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-3675|2024-08-21T14:08:41.868Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Web GUI) allows Reading Data from System Resources.This issue affects GateManager: from 11.0.623074018 before 11.0.623373051.

item.title: CVE-2023-3675|2024-04-18T10:41:32.348Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Web GUI) allows Reading Data from System Resources.This issue affects GateManager: from 11.0.623074018 before 11.0.623373051.

item.title: CVE-2024-1969|2024-06-04T18:00:05.549Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (webserver modules) allows crash of GateManager.This issue affects GateManager: from 9.7 before 11.2.624095033.

item.title: CVE-2024-1579|2024-06-04T17:59:30.225Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Incorrect Usage of Seeds in Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG) vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Webserver modules) allows Session Hijacking.This issue affects GateManager: before 11.2.624071020.

item.title: CVE-2024-1969|2024-08-01T18:56:22.773Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (webserver modules) allows crash of GateManager.This issue affects GateManager: from 9.7 before 11.2.624095033.

item.title: CVE-2024-1579|2024-08-01T18:40:21.431Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Incorrect Usage of Seeds in Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG) vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Webserver modules) allows Session Hijacking.This issue affects GateManager: before 11.2.624071020.

item.title: CVE-2023-3675|2024-08-02T07:01:57.508Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Web GUI) allows Reading Data from System Resources.This issue affects GateManager: from 11.0.623074018 before 11.0.623373051.
